text: HR& <ly TTTHTf gifeazut QN Phone 91-11.25074100/25074200 (v Ta6t 3  TTatrnf TATT4) #4 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) j-5 & 6, #-10 , ERTT, #fari-110075 G-5 & 6_ Sector-10 Dwarka_ New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 10.12.2015 POLICY_MATTERS-Technical (190/2015) (Decisin !ken in 26 [` Meeting Of Executive Committee vide .A gend: Item I} _ 261.10 placed by West Bengal Division) Sub: Single Tender for Consultancy Services-Clarification-reg: It is observed that sometimes although number of bids are received in to RFP for Consultaney Services, on evaluation of Teehnieal part otcthe "bidonsc 80 received, Only a single bid is found responsive As per prevalent practice; such a single bid is usually not considered for opening of financial bid and consequently bidsa aegee invited 'This leads to delay in the deployment of Consultants and adversely the targets and schedules ol projects apart fcom Ousing Contractud] adilicelioimpacts 2 In this regard  Executive Committee in its meeting dated 04.11.2015 decided that; as a policy in respect of  Consultancy   Services; single responsive bid on evaluation of multiple bids (2 or more) may not be treated a5 a single bid and that financial bid of such a single bidder may be opened for further consideration 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
